scripts.up: cd deployment/docker-compose && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -p pipeshub-ai up --build -d
scripts.railway: cd deployment/docker-compose && docker compose -f docker-compose.railway.yml -p pipeshub-ai up --build -d
scripts.down: cd deployment/docker-compose && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -p pipeshub-ai down
